prop.description: The field in the model of the form component, the form field model field, is required if the validate, resetFields methods are used
prop.description_zh: 传入 Form 组件的 model 中的字段，表单域 model 字段，在使用 validate、resetFields 方法的情况下，该属性是必填的

label-width.description: The width of the form field label, e.g. '50px'. Auto is supported.
label-width.description_zh: 表单域标签的的宽度，例如 '50px'。支持 auto。

required.description: If not, it will be automatically generated based on the validation rules
required.description_zh: 是否必填，如不设置，则会根据校验规则自动生成

error.description: Form Field Validation Error Message, setting this value will change the form validation status to Error and display the error message
error.description_zh: 表单域验证错误信息, 设置该值会使表单验证状态变为error，并显示该错误信息

show-message.description: Whether a verification error message is displayed
show-message.description_zh: 是否显示校验错误信息

inline-message.description: Displays the validation information in an inline form
inline-message.description_zh: 以行内形式展示校验信息

size.description: Used to control the size of the components within the form
size.description_zh: 用于控制该表单内组件的尺寸

methods.name: resetField
methods.description: Reset the form item, reset its value to the initial value, and remove the check result
methods.description_zh: 对该表单项进行重置，将其值重置为初始值并移除校验结果

methods.name: clearValidate
methods.description: Removes the validation result of the form item
methods.description_zh: 移除该表单项的校验结果

slots.name: label
slots.description: The content of the label text
